TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignedCms extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The class enables signing and verifying of CMS/PKCS #7 messages.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 密碼編譯訊息語法 RFC 與這些內容的型別，指定 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的檔案名稱副檔名與下列 MIME 類型。
|內容類型|MIME 類型|副檔名| |------------------|---------------|---------------| |envelopedData|應用程式/pkcs7 mime|.p7m| |signedData|應用程式/pkcs7 簽章|.p7s.p7c|

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: The constructor creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms>類別具有下列的預設屬性值。
|屬性|預設值| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.ContentInfo%2A>|1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 （資料） 長度： 0| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.Detached%2A>|卸離狀態： `false` CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的簽章資訊中包含已簽署內容。|
預設值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType>簽署人是 SubjectIdentifierType.IssuerAndSerialNumber。
如果中斷連結的狀態是`false`（預設值），以及簽章資訊的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息中包含帶正負號的內容。 如果中斷連結的狀態是`true`，無法解碼 S/MIME 訊息的用戶端仍然可以看到訊息的內容，如果它會個別傳送。 這可能是實用的封存的應用程式，以封存訊息內容是否可以驗證訊息傳送者的真實性。

Docs.exception: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType signerIdentifierType) cil managed

Docs.param: A member that specifies the default subject identifier type for signers.
Docs.summary: The constructor creates an instance of the class by using the specified subject identifier type as the default subject identifier type for signers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果中斷連結的狀態是`false`（預設值），以及簽章資訊的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息中包含已簽署的內容。 如果中斷連結的狀態是`true`，無法解碼 S/MIME 訊息的用戶端仍然可以看到訊息的內容，如果它會個別傳送。 這可能是實用的封存的應用程式，以封存訊息內容可以驗證訊息傳送者的真實性。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Certificates As X509Certificate2Collection

Docs.summary: The property retrieves the certificates associated with the encoded CMS/PKCS #7 message.
Docs.value: 代表編碼的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的憑證組的集合。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckHash() cil managed

Docs.summary: The method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message. is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications that only wish to check the hash of the CMS message, rather than perform a full digital signature verification. does not authenticate the author nor sender of the message because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature. For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of a CMS/PKCS #7 message, use the or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不提供將 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的驗證。

Docs.exception: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.

Docs.summary: Verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckSignature(bool verifySignatureOnly) cil managed

Docs.param: A value that specifies whether only the digital signatures are verified without the signers' certificates being validated. If verifySignatureOnly is , only the digital signatures are verified. If it is , the digital signatures are verified, the signers' certificates are validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated. The purposes of a certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.
Docs.summary: The method verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message and, optionally, validates the signers' certificates.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會驗證所有簽章，包括副署，將 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息上。 如果沒有帶正負號的屬性包含與訊息，也會驗證這些屬性。 如果選擇此選項來驗證憑證，驗證憑證鏈結的整個包含的部分。
如果數位簽章驗證失敗或不符合任何驗證需求，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。
## Examples 下列範例顯示的位置<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature%28System.Boolean%29>上驗證的簽章所需的步驟包括<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms>訊息。 在此範例中，訊息內容不會中斷。 訊息內容包含在<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms>訊息。
[!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#1)]
下列範例顯示的位置<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature%28System.Boolean%29>上驗證的簽章所需的步驟包括<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms>訊息。 在此範例中，訊息內容卸離，因此訊息內容必須驗證之外，獨立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms>訊息。
[!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#2)]

Docs.exception: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
A method call was invalid for the object's current state.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CheckSignature (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection extraStore, bool verifySignatureOnly);
.method public hidebysig instance void CheckSignature(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection extraStore, bool verifySignatureOnly) cil managed
Public Sub CheckSignature (extraStore As X509Certificate2Collection, verifySignatureOnly As Boolean)

Docs.param: An object that can be used to validate the certificate chain. If no additional certificates are to be used to validate the certificate chain, use instead of .

A value that specifies whether only the digital signatures are verified without the signers' certificates being validated. If verifySignatureOnly is , only the digital signatures are verified. If it is , the digital signatures are verified, the signers' certificates are validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated. The purposes of a certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.
Docs.summary: The method verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the specified collection of certificates and, optionally, validates the signers' certificates.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會驗證所有簽章，包括副署，將 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息上。 如果沒有帶正負號的屬性包含與訊息，也會驗證這些屬性。 如果選擇此選項來驗證憑證，驗證憑證鏈結的整個包含的部分。
如果數位簽章驗證失敗或不符合任何驗證需求，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。
## Examples 下列範例顯示的位置<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>上驗證的簽章所需的步驟包括<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms>訊息。 在此範例中，訊息內容不中斷，因此訊息內容包含在<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms>訊息。
[!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: The method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a signature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會顯示您可以在其中選擇此訊息的簽署人的使用者介面。 這需要確認目前的處理序正在執行*使用者互動模式*，亦即，屬性設定為`true`。 處理程序是通常於使用者互動模式中，除非它是服務處理程序或 Web 應用程式內執行。 簽署憑證的憑證符合下列條件將會顯示在清單中： - 憑證中有相關聯的私密金鑰。 - 憑證是在其有效期間內。 - 憑證中有沒有金鑰使用方式或支援數位簽章或不可否認性的金鑰使用方式。 簽署者憑證從選擇 My 存放區。 ## .NET Framework 安全性 下列權限，才能顯示使用者介面： - 下列權限，才能存取簽章金鑰： - - ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在計算的簽章使用不中斷的訊息內容的訊息。 在此情況下，將訊息內容包含在訊息。 [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#3)] 下列範例示範如何在計算的簽章使用卸離的訊息內容的訊息。 在此情況下，必須驗證訊息內容之外，獨立訊息。 [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#4)]

Docs.exception: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

to prompt the user to select a signing certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignerInfos As SignerInfoCollection

Docs.summary: The property retrieves the collection associated with the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
Docs.value: A物件，表示 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息簽署人資訊。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

Docs.summary: The property retrieves the version of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
Docs.value: Int 值，表示 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息版本。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本會決定訊息是否為 PKCS #7 訊息或密碼編譯訊息語法 (CMS) 訊息。 CMS 是 PKCS #7 的較新的超集。
